header.title: Erigon for BSC
header.description: The erigon node client is now available for Binance Smart Chain. This is a community RPC endpoint operated by Ankr, and includes full archive history for the chain.

nodes-table.description: The network is kept extremely stable using a backbone of globally distributed nodes. Additionally, the network is constantly monitored while traffic is automatically balanced and routed to reach the best-suited nodes.
